commentBody: I'm a Patriots fan, but the Chiefs are no joke. As for all the Patriot drama, it's not helping. That said, no team I can think of in NFL history has been so incredibly resilient. To people like Belichick and Brady ending the season 2-4 is meaningless. They know how to win football games when they have to. Andy Reid's had a magical season and I'm happy for him, but he hasn't played the Patriots, in Foxborough, in a playoff game. It should be a great game.
